channel.title: R Markdown on
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on

item.title: Testing R Markdown
item.description: Some lines of R code. For some reason the a is showing up with some really weird styling. a <- 1 b <- 2 c <- a + b c ## [1] 3 And a few lines of Python, just to test whether the syntax highlighting looks good. def say_hi(name): print("Hello,", name) return 1 + 2 say_hi("World") ## Hello, World
